confusion_risks.dialogue_excerpt: Detective: (firmly) Marcus, where were you the night of the incident? MARCUS: (nervously) I wasn't there. I was home all night. You should check the neighbors, though. They've been acting weird. (pauses, fidgets) (beat) You know, I've been thinking a lot about them. They've been acting strange lately.
confusion_risks.problem: Both Detective and Marcus are male, and the nervous tone of Marcus might blend with the firm tone of the Detective if not clearly distinguished.
confusion_risks.who_speaking_unclear: Lines 2 and 4 - can't tell if Marcus is still speaking or if the Detective is interjecting
confusion_risks.fix_needed: Add audio identifiers for the Detective
confusion_risks.suggested_fix: Detective = firm tapping of a pen, Marcus = lighter click and nervous fidgeting
confusion_risks.fix_script: DETECTIVE: (firmly, pen tapping) Marcus, where were you the night of the incident? [SFX: Lighter click, nervous fidgeting] MARCUS: (nervously) I wasn't there. I was home all night. You should check the neighbors, though. They've been acting weird. (pauses, fidgets) (beat) You know, I've been thinking a lot about them. They've been acting strange lately.

missing_cues.line: I wasn't there. I was home all night.

[Ambient: Faint hum of office machinery, distant phone ringing]

silence_opportunities.current_script: Marcus sits in the dimly lit room, his eyes scanning the area nervously. [SFX: Lighter clicks, soft echo in silence.]
silence_opportunities.enhanced_script: Marcus sits in the dimly lit room, his eyes scanning the area nervously. [SFX: Lighter clicks, soft echo] [SILENCE: 3 seconds - Marcus's eyes dart around the room, tension in the air] [SFX: Soft echo in silence]

silence_opportunities.current_script: Detective: (firmly) Marcus, where were you the night of the incident?
silence_opportunities.enhanced_script: Detective: (firmly) Marcus, where were you the night of the incident? [SILENCE: 5 seconds - Marcus fidgets, eyes downcast] MARCUS: (nervously) I wasn't there. I was home all night. You should check the neighbors, though. They've been acting weird.

scenes.heading: INT. DIMLY LIT ROOM - NIGHT
scenes.acoustic_properties: Soft surfaces, slight reverb, low ambient noise
ambient_layers: Faint hum of office machinery (constant, low)
scenes.audio_script: Marcus sits in the dimly lit room, his eyes scanning the area nervously. [SFX: Lighter clicks, soft echo in silence.] [SILENCE: 3s]

scenes.heading: INT. INTERROGATION ROOM - NIGHT
scenes.acoustic_properties: Hard surfaces, medium reverb, controlled ambient noise
ambient_layers: Faint hum of office machinery (constant, low)
scenes.audio_script: Detective: (firmly, with firm tapping of a pen) Marcus, where were you the night of the incident? [SFX: Firm pen tapping, nervous swallow] [SILENCE: 5s] MARCUS: (nervously, lighter click and nervous fidgeting) I wasn't there. I was home all night. You should check the neighbors, though. They've been acting weird. (pauses, fidgets) [SFX: Lighter clicks, slight tremor in voice] (beat) [SILENCE: 6s] You know, I've been thinking a lot about them. They've been acting strange lately. [SILENCE: 3s]

scenes.audio_script: Marcus fidgets with his hands, looking away from the detective. [SFX: Lighter clicks, tension builds] [SILENCE: 5s]

audio_optimized_script.complete_audio_script:
INT. DIMLY LIT ROOM - NIGHT
Marcus sits in the dimly lit room, his eyes scanning the area nervously. [SFX: Lighter clicks, soft echo in silence.] [SILENCE: 3s]

INT. INTERROGATION ROOM - NIGHT
Detective: (firmly, with firm tapping of a pen) Marcus, where were you the night of the incident? [SFX: Firm pen tapping, nervous swallow] [SILENCE: 5s] MARCUS: (nervously, lighter click and nervous fidgeting) I wasn't there. I was home all night. You should check the neighbors, though. They've been acting weird. (pauses, fidgets) [SFX: Lighter clicks, slight tremor in voice] (beat) [SILENCE: 6s] You know, I've been thinking a lot about them. They've been acting strange lately. [SILENCE: 3s]

INT. DETECTIVE'S OFFICE - NIGHT
Marcus fidgets with his hands, looking away from the detective. [SFX: Lighter clicks, tension builds] [SILENCE: 5s]
production_notes: Marcus's lighter click should be distinctive - same sound file each time for consistency
Nervous swallow should have a slight tremor in voice
Faint hum of office machinery and distant phone ringing should be consistent throughout the scenes
